message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the task of phrase grounding, which involves localizing objects in an image based on natural language queries. This task is commonly studied in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL) communities. The paper proposes a novel method that leverages external knowledge to improve weakly supervised grounding, which is a problem commonly studied in machine learning (cs.AI) and deep learning (cs.LG) communities. Finally, the paper involves optimization and reconstruction of information, which are topics commonly studied in information retrieval (cs.IR) community.
